channel.title: How Do I find the ip to put in when i go to no-ip.com
channel.description:
So this is what i've done so far, Ive made an account and all and set the no-ip as shascape.no-ip.info. But where do I find the IP to set it to, Iv'e already tried the Ip in the left hand corner of screen but i can't login to my server, when i type the ip as 127.0.0.1 and login my server as shascape.no-ip.info i can get in but no-one else can.
Help please
PS. I don't know if i need to download anything or not, but i tried to download no-ip and it has an error saying it doesnt recognize the file type and all, even though i have .rar so i cant get it downloaded.

item.title: How Do I find the ip to put in when i go to no-ip.com
item.dc:creator: @Sha_Owned Sha Owned
item.description:
@Sha_Owned wrote:

Ok i did that but i cant get in my server, i compiled and ran it, and i have everything set, the rules and all…why is this?

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I find the ip to put in when i go to no-ip.com

item.title: How Do I find the ip to put in when i go to no-ip.com
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Well 127.0.0.1 will not work, because it is your Local IP, only you can enter it.
For your real IP, when logged in to no-ip.org look in the left upper corner,
You should see something like this

Logged In As: *email adress* Current IP: *your IP here*

The Ip after the Current IP is the one you need to have, unless you are running a hamachi server, then you need the IP wich is shown on top of the Hamachi screen.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I find the ip to put in when i go to no-ip.com
